Token.Abstract: An NSData class extension that adds methods for converting between NSString and NSData instances.
Creates a new NSData instance by interpreting the passed-in string as a hexadecimal-encoded byte array.

Parameter.Name: hexString
Parameter.Abstract: The string to interpret as a hexadecimal representation of byte data.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSData instance, or nil if hexString could not be intepreted as hexadecimal.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string containing a hexadecimal representation of the bytes contained in the receiver.
Interprets the receiver as a byte-encoded string using the given encoding.

Parameter.Name: encoding
Parameter.Abstract: The NSStringEncoding to use for interpreting the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSString containing the receiver's bytes interpreted as the specified encoding, or nil if the receiver could not be interpreted using that encoding.

Token.Abstract: Interprets the receiver as a byte-encoded ASCII string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSString containing the receiver's bytes interpreted in ASCII format.

Token.Abstract: Interprets the receiver as a byte-encoded UTF-8 string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSString containing the receiver's bytes interpreted in UTF-8 format.

Token.Abstract: An alias for the toStringUTF8 method.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An NSString containing the receiver's bytes interpreted in UTF-8 format.
